meanings.definition: A trilithon is a structure consisting of two upright stones supporting a third horizontal stone.
meanings.sent1: The ancient trilithons stood tall in the field.
meanings.sent2: Visitors marveled at the massive trilithons at Stonehenge.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to balance on the trilithons.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the trilithons holding up the sky.
meanings.sent5: The trilithons loomed like giants in the landscape.

meanings.definition: Trilithons are commonly found in megalithic structures such as Stonehenge.
meanings.sent1: Many tourists come to see the trilithons at Stonehenge.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologists studied the trilithons carefully.
meanings.sent3: The trilithons seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The trilithons symbolized strength and unity.
meanings.sent5: The trilithons marked the passage of time with their shadows.

meanings.definition: The trilithons at Stonehenge are believed to have been constructed around 2500 BC.
meanings.sent1: Scholars debate the purpose of the trilithons at Stonehenge.
meanings.sent2: The trilithons' origin remains a mystery to many.
meanings.sent3: The trilithons threw a surprise birthday party for the rocks nearby.
meanings.sent4: The trilithons' age was a testament to human ingenuity.
meanings.sent5: The trilithons' shadows danced in the moonlight.
